name: Alone....
description:
Alone is an open world survival game where you must struggle for surviving another day.

You will spend a lot of time looting, cooking, crafting and harvesting so you can be in shape and live another day.

Story happens in the year 2023 when after a pandemic spread we enhanced Ai to help us , but the same Ai turned on us . Most of them mainly in a stand by  state they won 't attack  if they are not bothered but be aware .
